highlights: Received a stipend for exceptional performance in the undergraduate project titled 'Persian Paraphrasing'.

work.name: Drivee.ai
work.summary: Joined the startup early and contributed to initial product concepts and strategies.
highlights: Developed a high-detail car background removal and segmentation model.
Improved segmentation accuracy using advanced techniques.
Optimized models for CPU performance and inference speeds.
Applied CGANs to create realistic shadows and reflections.

work.name: Commercialization and Innovation Center of University of Kashan
work.summary: Worked on NLP models for Question Answering tasks using Huggingface Transformers.

work.name: Sina Teb
work.summary: Developed an AI system for car detection and tracking using UAV.
highlights: Achieved 99% accuracy in car detection from aerial images.
Optimized data from multiple sources for improved performance.

research.title: Deep Fake Detection
highlights: Reviewed five papers on deepfake detection.
Conducted experiments by training and evaluating models.
Proposed a new approach for improved detection.

research.title: GANs in Radiogenomics
highlights: Generated synthetic data for breast cancer detection.
Fused genomics data with MRI feature maps.
Presented research on GAN-based data augmentation.

research.title: Authentication and Clustering People in News
highlights: Summarized and analyzed papers on face detection in news images.

teaching.title: Fundamentals of Computer and Programming
highlights: Taught programming concepts using Visual Studio.

projects.name: Persian Paraphrasing
projects.summary: Developed a Persian paraphrasing model using transformer models.

projects.name: Genetic and PSO Algorithms
